com.communote.server.core.blog.events

Class TopicAccessRightsChangedEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.blog.events.TopicAccessRightsChangedEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Event, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AllUsersTopicAccessRightsChangedEvent, EntityTopicAccessRightsChangedEvent, ManagerGainedTopicAccessRightsChangedEvent

    public abstract class TopicAccessRightsChangedEvent
extends Object
implements Event
    Abstract event for access right changes.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • TopicAccessRightsChangedEvent

        public TopicAccessRightsChangedEvent(long topicId,
                                     String topicTitle,
                                     long grantingUserId,
                                     BlogRole oldRole,
                                     BlogRole newRole)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        topicId - ID of the topic, where the rights were changed.
        topicTitle - Title of the topic, where the rights were changed.
        grantingUserId - ID of the user who changed the rights.
        oldRole - The previous role. Might be null if none.
        newRole - Role which was set, a value of "null" means, that all rights where removed.

    • Method Detail

      • getGrantingUserId

        public long getGrantingUserId()
        Returns:
        ID of the user who changed the rights.

      • getNewRole

        public BlogRole getNewRole()
        Returns:
        The role or null if access was revoked.

      • getOldRole

        public BlogRole getOldRole()
        Returns:
        the oldRole

      • getTopicId

        public long getTopicId()
        Returns:
        the ID of the topic, where the rights were changed

      • getTopicTitle

        public String getTopicTitle()
        Returns:
        the title of the topic, where the rights were changed
